description:
Piano With Willie offers lessons to all skill levels of piano players. Willie uses the Foundational / Fundational approach when creating his lessons. Build upon your technique and polish up your skills with our piano lessons. This lesson will teach you improvisation techniques over Satin Doll and Canon in D. You’ll learn both Jazz and Pop/Rock improvisation styles. You’ll also learn about approaches into chord tones.

You will learn all the basics of getting started with improvising on the piano. Rhythm, style, chords will be learned with both hands separately and then together. You will be able to practice what you learn here with provided play along tracks.
title: Piano With Willie: Basics of Improvisation
